0: AN ACT INSTITUTING REFORMS TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT THE ECONOMIC, SOCIAL, POLITICAL RIGHTS AND WELL BEING OF COMMUNITY HEALTH WORKERS TOWARDS QUALITY HEALTH SERVICES DELIVERY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-02-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08927
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING REFORMS TO PROMOTE AND PROTECT THE ECONOMIC, SOCIAL, POLITICAL RIGHTS AND WELL BEING OF COMMUNITY HEALTH WORKERS TOWARDS QUALITY HEALTH SERVICES DELIVERY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Provides that there shall be one Barangay Health Center in every barangay which shall have: the basic and essential facilities and provisions; different functions related to the delivery of public health services in the community level; and its components as Community Health Team(CHT). Proposes for Barangay Health Workers' (BHWs) qualifications, compensation, incentives and benefits; Community Health Team’s (CHT) positions and hiring process, Community Health Workers (CHW) duties and responsibilities.
ALIAS NAME : "Barangay Health Workers and Services Reform Act"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ARENAS, ROSE MARIE "BABY" J.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2019-02-04
